characterIdsRaw: Photo 1 (20251221_194306.png): Far left lavender shirt = Morgan, center person with blonde/purple-lit hair = Oliver, right in black jacket = Victoria. Photo 2 (20251221_201826.png): Left with glasses and floral shirt = Morgan, right with purple lei = Oliver. Photo 3 (20251221_202238.png): Center with denim jacket and floral lei = Taylor. Photo 4 (20251221_203400.png): Foreground with marker = Cassandra (reporter NPC), pink shirt with glasses = Morgan. Photo 5 (20251221_205807.png): Center brown sleeveless with lei = Derek, left lavender = Cassandra, white shirt with jacket = Jessicah, far right with document = Diana, also visible = Kai. Photo 6 (20251221_205858.png): Center sleeveless = Derek, right with glasses = Jessicah, left blue = Cassandra, far right = Diana. Photo 7 is whiteboard only.
